reviews.text: Nice little restaurant on the side of the street that‚Äôs offer some great Mediterranean food. This place has limited seating with parking on street. We order the combo #3 ($32) and a Greek fries. The beef kabob is ok, kinda dry but the seasoning is pretty good. Chicken kabob was fantastic! The combo come with large portion that‚Äôs enough to feed two people. The fries was also pretty good. The kalamata olives in both salad and fries add a unique flavor to taste. Overall a great place for a fast meal. Definitely love the outdoor seating vibe

Overall, food and service are excellent.  We parked at nearby CVS free parking lot and walked to the restaurant.  Limited seating spaces (both inside and outside).  Well maintained facility with clean restroom.

Apr 25, 2024   Awesome Mediterranean cuisine restaurant !  Great place to grab a quick bite at lunch or have a nice dinner. Small but cozy. Fast and friendly service. Decent size portions, very fresh and tasty. Thank you very much, will come back whenever in Glendale area.

If you‚Äôre in Glendale, looking for a quaint little spot to eat outside under umbrellas ‚Äì even comfortable on the hottest days ‚Äì with wonderful Mediterranean food, this is it. Prices are fair, counter service, but they bring it to your table, just a really sweet place. I‚Äôll be back and hope there isn‚Äôt a line up next time because of the excellent reviews they‚Äôre getting and deserve.

Lemon Zest in Glendale is a fantastic spot for anyone looking for fresh and delicious Mediterranean cuisine! The moment I walked in, I was greeted by a warm and inviting atmosphere.

I ordered the chicken shawarma plate, and it was absolutely incredible‚Äîjuicy, well-seasoned chicken served with flavorful rice and a side of fresh salad. The garlic sauce was the perfect finishing touch! I also tried their falafel, which was crispy and packed with flavor.

The staff was friendly and attentive, making sure we had everything we needed throughout our meal. The prices are very reasonable for the quality of food you get.

If you're in Glendale and craving Mediterranean fare, Lemon Zest is a must-visit! I can‚Äôt wait to go back and explore more of their menu!

editorial_summary.overview: Easygoing, bright eatery offering counter-serve Mediterranean cuisine such as meat & veggies.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.6/5 rating across 5 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the cozy and inviting atmosphere, especially the outdoor seating under umbrellas, which remains comfortable even on hot days. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The fresh and delicious Mediterranean cuisine, particularly the chicken shawarma and falafel, consistently receives praise for its flavor and quality. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
Fast and friendly service enhances the dining experience, making customers feel well-attended and eager to return. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Limited seating and parking concerns - social media marketing can improve this area
Dry beef kabob feedback - review management can address this concern
Competition/discovery issues in Glendale - SEO services can solve this visibility issue
